001package gbw.melange.common.events.observability;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004
005/**
006 * <p>IFallibleObservableValue interface.</p>
007 *
008 * @author GustavBW
009 * @version $Id: $Id
010 */
011public interface IFallibleObservableValue<T> extends IObservableValue<T, IFallibleBiConsumer<T>, Integer> {
012    /**
013     * Sets the value of the observable. <br/>
014     * If the value does not pass the equality function, the filter chain is invoked and run.</br>
015     * Null is always ignored
016     *
017     * @param newer a T object
018     * @throws java.lang.Exception if any.
019     */
020    void set(T newer) throws Exception;
021
022    /**
023     * <p>setAllowExceptions.</p>
024     *
025     * @return Any exceptions that occurred during setting the value or running the filter chain if invoked.
026     * @param newer a T object
027     */
028    Collection<Exception> setAllowExceptions(T newer);
029}
